connection.name: Connection
connection.description: Questions to nurture closeness from afar

questions.question: What are you newly obsessed with?
Describe your favorite spots in your neighborhood.
What pissed you off this week?
Who have you grown closer to lately?
How do you spend your mornings?
What made you laugh last? Why?
Share some good news (big or small).
What have you been daydreaming about?
How have you been challenging yourself lately?
What do you eat when you're too tired to actually make anything?
Send a screenshot of the most unhinged part of your camera roll.
What have you changed your mind about? Why?
Pick a movie you can both watch this week. Set a date to talk about it.
What little thing reminds you of me?
What do you wish we could do together? What can we do instead?
